sentences.sContent: BHA Cell Differential Agent is extracted through botanic extraction technology of Japan macromolecule energy. It is a kind of esculent products with very strong ability to differentiate melanocyte .
sentences.sContent_eng: BHA Cell Differential Agent is extracted through botanic extraction technology of Japan macromolecule energy. It is a kind of esculent products with very strong ability to differentiate melanocyte .
sentences.sCn: BHA细胞分化剂，由日本高分子能量植物提取技术方法提取，可食用的产品，有极强的分化黑色素细胞能力。

sentences.sContent: The mercury content of esculent fresh water fishes produced from Shanghai was determined by means of the cold atomic absorption luminosity.
sentences.sContent_eng: The mercury content of esculent fresh water fishes produced from Shanghai was determined by means of the cold atomic absorption luminosity.
sentences.sCn: 以上海地区出产的食用淡水鱼为试样，通过冷原子吸收光度法检测鱼体中的汞含量。

sentences.sContent: But there are little reports on esculent function and bioactivity of rapeseed protein and peptide.
sentences.sContent_eng: But there are little reports on esculent function and bioactivity of rapeseed protein and peptide.
sentences.sCn: 但对菜籽蛋白、菜籽多肽食用功能及生物活性方面的深入研究尚鲜见报导。
